originalText.text: L'Atelier is such a charming school with a warm, homey environment. Our daughter attended this past year (3 yrs old) and really enjoyed it. She loves the activities, art, socializing with her friends. She had no prior French experience, but before the end of the year our daughter was counting regularly in French, singing songs in French. The teachers do a good job of customizing activities to meet the kids at their level. Highly recommend!

text.text: L'Atelier is such a charming school with a warm, homey environment. Our daughter attended this past year (3 yrs old) and really enjoyed it. The teachers do a good job of customizing activities to meet the kids at their level. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: We sent both our children to L’Atelier (now 7 & 5). Our experience was fantastic. The maîtresses were very thoughtful, engaging, caring & helpful with both our children & us. Our kids arrived with varying levels of French and both made great progress, allowing them both continue in French education. The community is great and our family really values the friends we made there. I cannot recommend them enough!

originalText.text: This is a very special place. Our daughter went in with very little French exposure and came out singing and talking in French. Outside of the curriculum, it's a terrific environment where I felt my daughter was getting the attention, warmth, and care she needed. We love this school!

text.text: This is a very special place. Our daughter went in with very little French exposure and came out singing and talking in French. Outside of the curriculum, it's a terrific environment where I felt my daughter was getting the attention, warmth, and care she needed. We love this school!

originalText.text: Going to L’Atelier is the best decision we have ever made. All of the teachers care so much about the students and my daughter loves to go to school from day 1. She didn’t speak any French and her English was also not good since we speak mostly mandarin at home. But the nurturing environment makes her confident and comfortable about speaking up. After less than a year she is able to sing French songs, count in French and understand some basic French. Unfortunately we are moving to San Francisco so my daughter cannot continue here anymore. We are super sad about leaving L’Atelier. Hopefully we can find somewhere similar in the Bay Area.

text.text: Going to L’Atelier is the best decision we have ever made. All of the teachers care so much about the students and my daughter loves to go to school from day 1. She didn’t speak any French and her English was also not good since we speak mostly mandarin at home. But the nurturing environment makes her confident and comfortable about speaking up. After less than a year she is able to sing French songs, count in French and understand some basic French. Unfortunately we are moving to San Francisco so my daughter cannot continue here anymore. We are super sad about leaving L’Atelier. Hopefully we can find somewhere similar in the Bay Area.

originalText.text: L’Atelier has been a great fit for our son and family. The three teachers, Emmanuelle, Cecile, and Aurelie have been wonderful, creating an enriching environment where the kids learn not only French, but also are excited about learning. Our son has made leaps and bounds in his French ability in the past year, and we intend to send our daughter as well. Lastly, the other parents at the school are a diverse and really nice group. We are very happy to be part of the L’Atelier community!
